SEARCH
Module comp3111.examsystem
Package comp3111.examsystem.controller

Class CourseManagementController

java.lang.Object
comp3111.examsystem.controller.CourseManagementController
public class CourseManagementController extends Object
Controller for managing courses in the HKUST Examination System. Provides functionality to add, delete, update, filter, and manage course-related data in the system. Interacts with the database to retrieve, modify, and save data. The class also supports managing associated quizzes and grades for a course, ensuring database consistency during operations like deletion.

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initializes the Course Management Controller. Sets up the database connections, loads the course data, configures the TableView, and establishes event listeners for managing user interactions.

    • addCourse

      public void addCourse(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Adds a course to the database. Prompts the user for confirmation before performing the operation.
      Parameters:
      event - The event triggered by clicking the "Add" button.

    • deleteCourse

      public void deleteCourse(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Deletes a course from the database. If the course has associated quizzes, those are also deleted after user confirmation.
      Parameters:
      event - The event triggered by clicking the "Delete" button.

    • updateCourse

      public boolean updateCourse(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Updates an existing course in the database. Prompts the user for confirmation if changes are detected.
      Parameters:
      event - The event triggered by clicking the "Update" button.
      Returns:
      true if the course is updated successfully, false otherwise.

    • updateCourseInDatabase

      public boolean updateCourseInDatabase(Course course)
      Update the course in the database
      Parameters:
      course - The course to update
      Returns:
      true if the course is updated successfully, false otherwise

    • validateUpdateInput

      public boolean validateUpdateInput(Course course, List<String> changes)
      Validate the input for updating a course
      Parameters:
      course - The course to update
      changes - The list of changes to make
      Returns:
      true if the input is valid, false otherwise

    • deleteCourseAndQuizzes

      public void deleteCourseAndQuizzes(Course course, List<Quiz> quizzesToDelete)
      Delete a course and its quizzes from the database
      Parameters:
      course - The course to delete
      quizzesToDelete - The quizzes to delete

    • deleteCourseFromDatabase

      public void deleteCourseFromDatabase(Course course)
      Delete a course from the database
      Parameters:
      course - The course to delete

    • addCourseToDatabase

      public void addCourseToDatabase()
      Add a course to the database

    • validateID

      public boolean validateID(String id)
      Validate the course ID. Ensures the ID follows the format: 4 uppercase letters followed by 4 digits. Additionally, checks for uniqueness among existing courses.
      Parameters:
      id - The course ID to validate
      Returns:
      true if the course ID is valid, false otherwise

    • validateDepartment

      public boolean validateDepartment(String department)
      Validate the department name. Ensures the department exists within a predefined list of valid departments.
      Parameters:
      department - The department to validate
      Returns:
      true if the department is valid, false otherwise

    • loadCourseTable

      public List<Course> loadCourseTable()
      Load the course table with data from the database. If filters are applied, the table is populated with filtered results. Otherwise, all courses are loaded.
      Returns:
      a list of filtered courses if filters are applied. otherwise empty list

    • noFilter

      public boolean noFilter()
      Check if no filters are currently applied to the course table. This is used to determine whether to load all courses or apply filtering logic.
      Returns:
      true if no filters are applied, false otherwise
